sentences.en: Contentment made him even more amiable, and his business thrived.
sentences.cn: 心里舒服,对人就更和气, 买卖也就更顺心.

sentences.en: Do you really want to go or are you merely being amiable?
sentences.cn: 你是真的想去呢,还是仅仅为了表示友好?

sentences.en: He is a most amiable fellow.
He is an educated, amiable and decent man.
sentences.cn: 他是个有教养、和蔼可亲的正人君子。

sentences.en: I never met with a disposition more truly amiable.
sentences.cn: 这样可爱的人我还从来没见过.

sentences.en: I think him everything that is worthy and amiable.
sentences.cn: 我认为他做任何事都表现出品德高尚,和蔼可亲.

sentences.en: Julia says she has never seen him so amiable.
sentences.cn: 朱丽雅说从未见他那么好说话.

sentences.en: Our family was a wonderful nest of amiable contempt.
sentences.cn: 我们是一家和蔼而喜欢彼此讽刺的妙人.

sentences.en: Sara, while remaining outwardly amiable toward all concerned, was inwardly furious.
sentences.cn: 萨拉尽管表面上对所有相关的人依然和蔼可亲，内心却怒火中烧。

sentences.en: She had been surprised at how amiable and polite he had seemed.
sentences.cn: 看到他如此和蔼可亲、彬彬有礼，她非常惊讶。

sentences.en: She was generous, amiable, interesting; she was everything but prudent.
sentences.cn: 她慷慨大方, 和蔼可亲,逗人喜欢, 除了不够谨慎之外, 她什么都好.

sentences.en: She was in an amiable mood.
The amiable Vengeance added, with a laugh, " Yes, my faith!
sentences.cn: 复仇女神快活地笑着说, “ 不错, 说得对!

sentences.en: The driver was an amiable young man.
sentences.cn: 司机是位友善的年轻人。

sentences.en: The next - door neighbours are very amiable people.
We have a very amiable companionship.
sentences.cn: 我们之间存在一种友好的关系.

trans.tran_cn: 和蔼可亲的，令人愉悦的
(Amiable)人名；(法)阿米亚布勒；(英)阿米娅布尔
